definitions.definition: used to attract somebody’s attention or to introduce a comment
used to check that somebody agrees with you or understands you

examples.text: I'll do it my way, OK?

definitions.definition: used to stop people arguing with you or criticizing you

examples.text: OK, so I was wrong. I'm sorry.

wordOrigin: mid 19th cent. (originally US): probably an abbreviation of orl korrect, humorous form of all correct, popularized as a slogan during President Van Buren's re-election campaign of 1840 in the US; his nickname Old Kinderhook (derived from his birthplace) provided the initials.
